main event: A 73-year-old woman observed a bright disc-like object in the sky, resembling the full moon, for approximately two minutes in Hindsville, Arkansas.
interesting points: The object was bright aluminum and flat round in shape., It flew from west to east at a speed consistent with an aircraft., The observer noted it did not make any sound and left no trail., A small black aircraft was seen in the area about ten minutes after the sighting., The weather was clear with the sun shining at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: one bright disc-like object in the sky
witness description: a 73-year-old woman, whose character and integrity are described as excellent by neighbors
